Medvedev responded with a provocative statement referencing Russia's Cold War nuclear strategy, prompting Trump's strong reaction and concerns about unintended consequences.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/highly-provocative-us-deploys-two-nuclear-subs-trump-warns-ex-russian-president-medvedev-of-unintended-consequences/articleshow/123048083.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/highly-provocative-us-deploys-two-nuclear-subs-trump-warns-ex-russian-president-medvedev-of-unintended-consequences/articleshow/123048083.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 22:39:56 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1035297" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123048135,imgsize-1035297.cms"/></item><item><title>'Fire vs lamp': China torches US for hypocrisy over trade with Russia</title><description><![CDATA[China has strongly refuted US accusations of supporting Russia's war efforts in Ukraine, labeling the claims as hypocritical. A Chinese representative at the UN criticized the US for its double standards, questioning why Washington can trade with Russia while restricting others. China maintains it hasn't provided lethal weapons and urged the US to cease blame-shifting and focus on ending the conflict.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/china/fire-vs-lamp-china-torches-us-for-hypocrisy-why-can-you-trade-with-russia-but-not-us/articleshow/123047038.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/china/fire-vs-lamp-china-torches-us-for-hypocrisy-why-can-you-trade-with-russia-but-not-us/articleshow/123047038.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 21:48:25 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1010345" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123047614,imgsize-1010345.cms"/></item><item><title>'Feel like slapping them': Telangana CM's shock remark on young scribes sparks outcry</title><description><![CDATA[Telangana's Chief Minister, A Revanth Reddy, is facing backlash after criticizing young journalists for lacking respect and etiquette at an event. His remarks sparked outrage, with press associations demanding clarification. Simultaneously, Reddy criticized political parties for owning media outlets and addressed concerns about social media misinformation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/i-sometimes-feel-like-slapping-them-telangana-cm-slams-young-journalists-says-party-run-media-hurts-journalism/articleshow/123039956.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/i-sometimes-feel-like-slapping-them-telangana-cm-slams-young-journalists-says-party-run-media-hurts-journalism/articleshow/123039956.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 17:46:03 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="519050" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123044084,imgsize-519050.cms"/></item><item><title>'ATS pressurised, evidence erased': Acquitted accused in Malegaon blast case</title><description><![CDATA[Sameer Kulkarni, acquitted in the Malegaon blast case, accuses Congress leaders and the Maharashtra ATS of framing Hindus for political gain. He alleges evidence manipulation and pressure on investigators. Retired inspector Mehiboob Mujawar supports this, claiming he was ordered to implicate RSS chief Mohan Bhagwat.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ats-pressurized-evidence-erased-acquitted-accused-in-malegaon-blast-case-names-sharad-pawar-digvijay-singh/articleshow/123047292.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ats-pressurized-evidence-erased-acquitted-accused-in-malegaon-blast-case-names-sharad-pawar-digvijay-singh/articleshow/123047292.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 21:37:57 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1386724" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123047344,imgsize-1386724.cms"/></item><item><title>LinkedIn cofounder Reid Hoffman says Blue states have a problem that needs fixing</title><description><![CDATA[Reid Hoffman admits that the Democratic Party alienated Silicon Valley. This drove tech leaders towards Donald Trump. He says attacks on cryptocurrency and Big Tech companies caused this shift. Hoffman points to California's regulations as a problem. He notes companies like Aurora Innovation tested in Texas due to better rules. He urges Democrats to adopt business-friendly policies.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/linkedin-founder-reid-hoffman-silicon-valleys-biggest-democrat-supporter-says-theres-a-problem-with-blue-states-and-they-need-to-/articleshow/123018971.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/linkedin-founder-reid-hoffman-silicon-valleys-biggest-democrat-supporter-says-theres-a-problem-with-blue-states-and-they-need-to-/articleshow/123018971.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 16:21:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="40280" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123018898,imgsize-40280.cms"/></item><item><title>At least 3 terrorists trapped by security forces in Kulgam; operation under way</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/jk-encounter-at-least-3-terrorists-trapped-by-security-forces-in-kulgam-operation-under-way/articleshow/123047559.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/jk-encounter-at-least-3-terrorists-trapped-by-security-forces-in-kulgam-operation-under-way/articleshow/123047559.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 21:56:02 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1212663" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123047615,imgsize-1212663.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG: Harry Brook does a Rishabh Pant - Who did it better? Watch</title><description><![CDATA[Harry Brook's audacious shot against Mohammed Siraj, reminiscent of Rishabh Pant, became the highlight of the rain-interrupted final Test. Brook's improvisational six, executed while losing balance, drew comparisons to Pant's fearless batting style. Despite India's earlier innings of 224 and England's quick start, Brook's moment of brilliance captured the attention of fans and commentators alike.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-5th-test-harry-brook-does-a-rishabh-pant-who-did-it-better-watch/articleshow/123047588.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-5th-test-harry-brook-does-a-rishabh-pant-who-did-it-better-watch/articleshow/123047588.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 21:59:47 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="63492" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123047593,imgsize-63492.cms"/></item><item><title>Where's the oil? Trump's Pak deal more strategic than realistic; move to pressure India?</title><description><![CDATA[Donald Trump's announcement of a deal to develop Pakistan's oil reserves is viewed with skepticism. Experts suggest it's a strategic move to counter China's influence and pressure India on trade, rather than a reflection of Pakistan's immediate hydrocarbon potential. The viability of these reserves remains unproven, requiring significant investment and time, especially given the risky locations.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/trumps-pak-oil-deal-a-move-to-counter-china-pressure-india/articleshow/123027257.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/trumps-pak-oil-deal-a-move-to-counter-china-pressure-india/articleshow/123027257.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 23:31:56 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SANJAY DUTTA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="962822" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123027529,imgsize-962822.cms"/></item><item><title>PayPal and Venmo down: US users report facing issues with sending and receiving money</title><description><![CDATA[Major disruptions hit PayPal and Venmo in the US, leaving millions unable to send or receive money. Starting around 9 a.m. ET, users faced transaction failures and login issues. While PayPal cited problems with online and retail checkouts, Venmo also experienced outages despite being listed as operational.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/paypal-and-venmo-down-us-users-report-facing-issues-with-sending-and-receiving-money/articleshow/123047814.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/paypal-and-venmo-down-us-users-report-facing-issues-with-sending-and-receiving-money/articleshow/123047814.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 22:26:31 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="26116" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123047924,imgsize-26116.cms"/></item><item><title>'Anti-India hostility': Centre trashes 'dubious' UK report on transnational repression</title><description><![CDATA[India has vehemently refuted a British parliamentary committee report accusing it of transnational repression in the UK, dismissing the allegations as baseless. The Ministry of External Affairs stated that the report relies on dubious sources with a history of anti-India sentiment.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/documented-history-of-anti-india-hostility-centre-trashes-uk-parliamentary-report-calls-out-unverified-and-dubious-sources/articleshow/123045708.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/documented-history-of-anti-india-hostility-centre-trashes-uk-parliamentary-report-calls-out-unverified-and-dubious-sources/articleshow/123045708.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 19:20:59 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1246733" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123046057,imgsize-1246733.cms"/></item><item><title>'There can be no discussion because ... ': Rijiju rules out Parl debate on Bihar SIR</title><description><![CDATA[Union Minister Kiren Rijiju has dismissed the possibility of a parliamentary discussion on Bihar's electoral roll revision, emphasizing the Election Commission's autonomy. Opposition parties, however, allege the revision aims to disenfranchise voters, disrupting Parliament proceedings with demands for a debate.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/bihar-sir-there-can-be-no-discussion-because-rijiju-rules-out-parliament-debate-opposition-ups-charge/articleshow/123046899.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/bihar-sir-there-can-be-no-discussion-because-rijiju-rules-out-parliament-debate-opposition-ups-charge/articleshow/123046899.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 20:57:36 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1679402" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123046901,imgsize-1679402.cms"/></item><item><title>Peter Navarro says Donald Trump deserves Nobel in economics; cites global overhaul</title><description><![CDATA[White House trade advisor Peter Navarro suggests Donald Trump deserves a Nobel Prize in economics for fundamentally restructuring global trade through aggressive tariff policies and prioritizing American economic interests. Trade between the two nations reached $131.8 billion in fiscal year 2024-25. India remains firm on not offering duty concessions for agricultural, dairy, and GM products, citing religious sentiments.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/donald-trumps-25-tariff-india-expects-minimal-impact-indicates-agriculture-dairy-gm-food-no-go-areas-in-trade-deal-talks/articleshow/123042641.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/donald-trumps-25-tariff-india-expects-minimal-impact-indicates-agriculture-dairy-gm-food-no-go-areas-in-trade-deal-talks/articleshow/123042641.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 16:47:08 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="65312" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123043030,imgsize-65312.cms"/></item><item><title>WWE SmackDown preview & streaming details: Full match card, confirmed segments, start timings & more</title><description><![CDATA[WWE SmackDown, airing live from Newark on August 1, 2025, will be the go-home show for SummerSlam. Giulia defends her Women's United States Championship against Zelina Vega, and Los Garza issue an open challenge.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/wwe/top-stories/wwe-smackdown-08/01/25-preview-and-streaming-details-full-match-card-confirmed-segments-how-to-watch-start-timings-and-more/articleshow/123045426.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/wwe/top-stories/wwe-smackdown-08/01/25-preview-and-streaming-details-full-match-card-confirmed-segments-how-to-watch-start-timings-and-more/articleshow/123045426.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 19:27:48 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="137916" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123045738,imgsize-137916.cms"/></item><item><title>Mob violence in Pune village: Sec 144 imposed; what triggered tensions?</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/mob-violence-in-pune-clashes-erupt-in-yavat-village-over-objectionable-social-media-post-section-144-imposed-top-developments/articleshow/123045325.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/mob-violence-in-pune-clashes-erupt-in-yavat-village-over-objectionable-social-media-post-section-144-imposed-top-developments/articleshow/123045325.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 19:16:53 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="78456" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123045614,imgsize-78456.cms"/></item><item><title>On right track: Railway Protection Force gets first-ever woman DG</title><description><![CDATA[In a historic move, Sonali Mishra, a senior IPS officer, has been appointed as the Director General of the Railway Protection Force (RPF), becoming the first woman to lead the 143-year-old security force. Mishra, a 1993-batch officer, brings over 30 years of experience from various prestigious organizations.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/on-right-track-railway-protection-force-gets-first-ever-woman-dg-who-is-sonali-mishra/articleshow/123046709.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/on-right-track-railway-protection-force-gets-first-ever-woman-dg-who-is-sonali-mishra/articleshow/123046709.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 20:43:21 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="968520" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123046715,imgsize-968520.cms"/></item><item><title>Bihar SIR: Over 65 lakh voters not included in draft rolls; Patna tops list</title><description><![CDATA[Bihar's draft electoral rolls omitted over 65 lakh names after a Special Intensive Revision. Patna had the highest number of missing voters. The Election Commission released new draft rolls, allowing citizens to file claims. Opposition parties criticized the exclusions, alleging they favored the ruling NDA. Parliament saw protests and adjournment over the issue. The Supreme Court emphasized en masse inclusion.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/bihar-sir-over-65-lakh-voters-not-included-in-draft-rolls-patna-east-champaran-madhubani-top-list/articleshow/123045980.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/bihar-sir-over-65-lakh-voters-not-included-in-draft-rolls-patna-east-champaran-madhubani-top-list/articleshow/123045980.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 19:49:35 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1707405" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123046022,imgsize-1707405.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG: 'Just bat, ball and go home?' - KL Rahul rages at umpire after Prasidh-Root spat</title><description><![CDATA[Day 2 of the India-England Test at The Oval saw heated exchanges as Prasidh Krishna and Joe Root engaged in a verbal spat, requiring umpire intervention. Shortly after, KL Rahul confronted umpire Kumar Dharmasena, questioning restrictions on player interactions. Tensions escalated post-lunch, reflecting India's aggressive approach in this crucial game.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-5th-test-just-bat-ball-and-go-home-kl-rahul-rages-at-umpire-after-prasidh-krishna-joe-root-spat/articleshow/123046328.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-5th-test-just-bat-ball-and-go-home-kl-rahul-rages-at-umpire-after-prasidh-krishna-joe-root-spat/articleshow/123046328.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 20:18:16 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="46092" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123046384,imgsize-46092.cms"/></item><item><title>Man slaps 'nervous' passenger on IndiGo flight; handed over to security - video</title><description><![CDATA[On an IndiGo Mumbai-Kolkata flight, a passenger experiencing a panic attack was assaulted by a co-traveler. The incident occurred while the aircraft was taxiing, prompting the victim to request disembarkation. IndiGo has condemned the unruly behavior, handed over the assaulter to security, and initiated actions that could lead to a no-fly list designation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/in-flight-fury-goes-viral-passenger-slapped-mid-air-on-indigo-flight-suffers-panic-attack-crew-intervenes-accused-handed-to-cisf/articleshow/123046135.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/in-flight-fury-goes-viral-passenger-slapped-mid-air-on-indigo-flight-suffers-panic-attack-crew-intervenes-accused-handed-to-cisf/articleshow/123046135.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 20:10:40 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SAURABH SINHA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="426342" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123046204,imgsize-426342.cms"/></item><item><title>Happy sister's day: Best messages, quotes, wishes and images to share </title><description><![CDATA[In 1996, Tricia Eleogram and her sister established Sister's Day in Memphis, Tennessee, to celebrate the unique bond between sisters. This day encourages people to cherish their sisters and share affection. They surpassed Greenidge and Haynes with their eighth 50-plus stand, accumulating the highest runs for an England opening pair against India.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-5th-test-ben-duckett-and-zak-crawley-make-history-become-first-opening-pair-to-achieve-this-feat-vs-india/articleshow/123043217.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-5th-test-ben-duckett-and-zak-crawley-make-history-become-first-opening-pair-to-achieve-this-feat-vs-india/articleshow/123043217.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 17:03:28 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="122282" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123043362,imgsize-122282.cms"/></item><item><title>Rape case: How Prajwal Revanna reacted in court after conviction</title><description><![CDATA[Prajwal Revanna, grandson of former Prime Minister H.D. Deve Gowda, was convicted Friday in Bengaluru in a rape case involving a domestic help. The special court found him guilty of raping the woman at his farmhouse in 2021, acts allegedly recorded on his phone.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/broke-down-started-weeping-prajwal-revanna-in-tears-after-his-conviction-in-rape-case-quantum-of-punishment-tomorrow/articleshow/123041094.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/broke-down-started-weeping-prajwal-revanna-in-tears-after-his-conviction-in-rape-case-quantum-of-punishment-tomorrow/articleshow/123041094.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 15:35:04 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="28758" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123041162,imgsize-28758.cms"/></item><item><title>Charles wept over Camilla night before marrying Diana, insiders share details</title><description><![CDATA[King Charles and Princess Diana's wedding, though seemingly a fairy tale, was fraught with heartache. Both reportedly cried the night before, Charles due to his lingering love for Camilla, whom he honored with cufflinks, and Diana due to her own reservations. The marriage was further strained by Camilla's continued presence and Diana's struggles, casting a shadow over their union from the start.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/uk/royal-love-triangle-charles-wept-over-camilla-night-before-marrying-diana-insiders-say-wedding-was-doomed-from-day-one/articleshow/123042136.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/uk/royal-love-triangle-charles-wept-over-camilla-night-before-marrying-diana-insiders-say-wedding-was-doomed-from-day-one/articleshow/123042136.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 16:24:37 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="751332" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123042526,imgsize-751332.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[No interim US-India trade deal yet; Indian exporters brace for 20-25% tariffs as August 1 deadline nears]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-us-trade-deal-delay-trump-tariffs-impact-exporters-19644819.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Indian exporters are gearing up for possible US tariffs of 20–25% as the August 1 deadline set by President Trump approaches without an interim trade deal. While the tariff uncertainty has stalled orders, industry leaders say Indian exporters remain competitively placed compared to rivals like Bangladesh and China. Exporters expect the tariffs to impact profit margins more than supply chains, with fresh orders likely once clarity emerges post-deadline. Trade talks are set to resume in August as both countries work toward a broader agreement.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Mon, 28 Jul 2025 23:11:22 +0530]]></pubDate>

    </item>
